About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm a second year student at LUT university studying software engineering. I have just finished the 4th period of my second year and I have already started some of my summer courses. I have various hobbies and pastimes I like to engage in.

Music

Tubist in brassbands

I play in multiple brass bands right now: Montolan puhallin orkesteri, Ratsuväen Perinne Soittokunta and MPK Kaakkois-Suomen Soittokunta. I also participate in military refresh courses in Puolustusvoimien Varusmiessoittokunta when ever possible.

Gaming

Love-hate relationship

I have always loved video games, but lately I've been noticing a lot of bs. I'm not fond of. Starting with live services that enable us to pay 70€ for early access games that might get finished if there are enough players. Lootboxes as "options" when unlocking everything thorough legit ways might take 10 000+ hours and loads of other predatory practises. Other than that I'm currently interested in Elden Ring, Nier Replicant and Hollow Knight: Silksong.

Golf

Amateur

I don't play very often and I'm not very good, but when ever I get to play I really enjoy it. My strong suit is my long drive and slice is the bane of my existance.
